alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 3:02AM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible, especially for elevations above 1000 feet. * WHERE...Bennington, Western Windham and Eastern Windham Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Valley areas may see some mixing with rainfall, reducing snow accumulation in those areas. The highest chance of moderate to heavy snowfall accumulation will be within the southern Green Mountains.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
